item.title: Chinese ‘Virtual Human’ Salespeople Are Outperforming Their Real Human Counterparts
item.description: Built using AI technology from Baidu and DeepSeek, the virtual livestreamers sell everything from wet wipes to printers 24 hours a day, seven days a week.

item.description: Built using AI technology from Baidu and DeepSeek, the virtual livestreamers sell everything from wet wipes to printers 24 hours a day, seven days a week.

item.title: OpenAI Is Poised To Become The Most Valuable Startup Ever. Should It Be?
item.description: The AI startup is chasing a $500 billion valuation, with backers betting it can become the next Apple or Google. There are reasons for skepticism.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Panicking About Zohran Mamdani. NYC’s Tech Scene Is Not
item.description: New York City tech leaders aren’t rattled by the prospect of a Mayor Mamdani. In fact, many of them welcome it.

item.title: Why You Can’t Trust a Chatbot to Talk About Itself
item.description: Anytime you expect AI to be self-aware, you’re in for disappointment. That’s just not how it works.

item.title: Inside Dylan Field’s Big IPO—and His Even Bigger Plans for Figma
item.description: Dylan Field took Figma public in one of the wildest IPOs in recent memory. He insists the real story is the rise of design itself.

item.title: Cursor’s New Bugbot Is Designed to Save Vibe Coders From Themselves
item.description: One of the most popular platforms for AI-assisted programming says the next era of vibe coding is all about supercharging error detection.

item.title: Silicon Valley AI Startups Are Embracing China’s Controversial ‘996’ Work Schedule
item.description: In an industry once known for cushy perks, some founders are now asking staff to commit to a 72-hour weekly schedule. You’re either in or you’re out.

item.title: Thinking Machines Lab Raises a Record $2 Billion, Announces Cofounders
item.description: Mira Murati and several other former OpenAI researchers are behind the buzzy AI startup, now valued at $12 billion and officially out of stealth.
